author: farhan
title: WOMAN FOUND DEAD IN TAMPINES , MAID LOOKED LOST
text:
WOMAN FOUND DEAD IN TAMPINES , MAID LOOKED LOST Submitted by farhan on 
Dear A.S.S. Editor Advertisement 
Oh dear! Read in the news of a 77 year old woman who was found dead in a Tampines flat, with apparently a bloodied knife lodged in her throat. The wheelchair bound woman was then home alone with her maid, and her husband had been out for a routine hospital check-up. 
Police are still investigating, with the maid seen leaving with the police yesterday to assist in the investigations. The wheelchair bound woman had suffered from stroke three years ago, making her rely on her husband to get around. The Indonesian maid had been with the family for only about a month. 
We can only wonder what happen. The poor husband has now lost his wife in tragic circumstances. 
Ted Lau 
A.S.S. Contributor Editor's Note: 
If not, why not give us a 'Like' ? Filed Under:
